featured.text: It was discovered on the Chilkoot Pass, the famous trail used by the people seeking gold in Alaska.

definition.zh_def: 奇爾庫特，指的是一個位於美國阿拉斯加州的山脈，著名於其歷史上的淘金熱。
definition.en_def: Chilkoot refers to a mountain pass in Alaska, historically significant during the Klondike Gold Rush.
definition.example: The Chilkoot Pass was a challenging route for gold seekers in the late 1800s.
